name: Access Partnership
goal:
Our mission is to provide our clients a way in to new ICT markets.

We provide an experienced, multi-disciplinary, multilingual staff to devise and implement a strategy for resolving political, technical, and regulatory barriers to trade on five continents.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market package, telecoms review, ePrivacy Regulation, Radio Spectrum Policy Group, activities of the Body of European Regulators of Electronic Communications, Space Strategy for Europe and the GOVSATCOM initiative, Copyright Directive
